title: Cooling pot of tea part - a

content.question: Use the data in the table to approximate the rate at which the temperature of the tea is changing at time t = 3.5. Show the computations that lead to your answer.

frqParts.text: Use the data in the table to approximate the rate at which the temperature of the tea is changing at time t = 3.5. Show the computations that lead to your answer.

topic.text: 2.3: Estimating Derivatives of a Function at a Point
